article_title: South Wind Hospice expands its mission
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description:
South Wind Hospice is on the final countdown to converting the hospice home at 496 Yucca Lane to South Wind Home, a home-plus adult care facility. They’ve passed their preliminary inspection, Sheryl White has been licensed as the operator and plans and procedures have been accepted by the state.
As soon as the Kansas fire marshal makes his inspection — and he’s always liked the building, according to Executive Director Ginger Goering — they’re ready for residents
article_metadata.author: Carol Bronson

og.description: South Wind Hospice is on the final countdown to converting the hospice home at 496 Yucca Lane to South Wind Home, a home-plus adult care facility.
